|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad2ax = 861 |nqam2 = 750 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[ASUS RT-AX86U]] (AX5700) • (HND-962118_BASE)/BCM84880 :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXI600 MSQ-RTAXI600] (2020-02-12) According to [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RTAXI600/Test-Report/Test-Report-2-4GHz-4616846 FCC Report], the [[ASUS RT-AX86U|RT-AX86U]] and the [[ASUS RT-AX5700|RT-AX5700]] are identical. {{see also|ASUS RT-AX5700|ASUS RT-AX88U|ASUS RT-AC86U}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[https://www.pcmarket.com.hk/2020/01/08/【ces-2020】手機打機優先-asus-rt-ax86u-wifi-6-router/ ''CES 2020: ASUS RT-AX86U WiFi 6 Router'' on '''PC|Market'''] *[https://www.asus.com/us/News/rU7DdBAsBXMQ5cn0 ''ASUS Announces a Complete Lineup of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''ASUS'''] *[https://edgeup.asus.com/2018/asus-introduces-family-802-11ax-routers-for-busy-wifi-networks/ ''ASUS Introduces a Complete Family of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''ASUS'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/rt-ax86u-rt-ax5700-hits-the-fcc.61778/ ''ASUS RT-AX86U/RT-AX5700 hits the FCC'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/asus-expands-11ax-lineup-and-sets-ship-date.47010/ ''ASUS Expands 11ax Lineup And Sets Ship Date'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://urouter.ru/review/asus-rt-ax86u.html ''ASUS RT-AX86U (RT-AX5700)'' on '''URouter'''] (RU) • [https://lkml.org/lkml/2020/9/30/158 LKML] :HW 1.0 - BCM54991 / HW 2.0 - RTL8226B (2.5G PHY EXT) 
#ifdef RTCONFIG_EXTPHY_BCM84880 int ext_phy_model = 
nvram_get_int("ext_phy_model"); // 0: BCM54991, 1: RTL8226
#endif
